actions.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing that reports of the Comptroller General of the United States made to the Congress shall be printed during such adjournment as House documents of the second session of the Ninety-eighth Congress.

summary.text: Provides for the printing as House documents of the reports of the Comptroller General pursuant to the Government Corporation Control Act.

titles.title: A resolution providing that reports of the Comptroller General of the United States made to the Congress shall be printed during such adjournment as House documents of the second session of the Ninety-eighth Congress.
